reviewtext: This lens might be okay for beginners, but if you are into any quality photographyGET THE CANON 70-200 L (f/2.8 or f/4 with or without IS)CONS-Slow aperture-Not sharp enough-Not an L-Paint is chipping offPROS- Cheep, (but not worth it unless you don't care for quality)My recommendation... Buy a Canon 70-200 L instead (even the f/4 will blow this lens away)
summary: Not sharp, Slow aperture and Slow focus
